programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: The End

He reveals a universe far stranger than anyone has yet imagined, and, at the frontier of our understanding, encounters a mysterious and enigmatic force that promises to change physics forever.

programme.title: Cloud Cities of Venus
programme.desc: The surface air of Venus is 95% carbon dioxide, and has an atmospheric pressure equivalent to being 900 meters deep in the ocean. These conditions are of course, unlivable for humans. However the key to settling on the second planet from the Sun might not lie on its surface, but hang in its clouds.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E5 "From Flats Skiffs to Wakeboards"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson pole the crystal clear flats off Marathon in the Florida Keys using the Two Conchs Yellowfin 17 skiff. The brothers also visit Keys Cable Park to try their hand at wakeboarding.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E6 "Marathon Permit and Key West Fish Dip"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson head offshore Marathon to fish for permit on the wrecks. The brothers also visit Key West to sample and rate smoked fish dip from local hot spots.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E1 "Cobia Madness and Aquarium Encounters"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson fish in the Florida Bay for an epic cobia bite. They also visit Florida Keys Aquarium encounters to swim with the locals.

programme.title: Spanish Fly E7 "Expedition to the Seychelles" (2009)
The "Off-Season" S1:E5 "240 Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Buying land is something most people dream about. Whether you hunt, fish, or partake in other outdoor activities, there is just something about doing it on YOUR LAND. In most cases, buying a piece of property is the biggest investment in a person's life. Doing your research and putting boots on the ground is crucial in order to find out if the property is worth your money. With he correct management plan, even the most misused piece of land can be turned into a property of your dreams!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E6 "240 pt. 2"
programme.desc: With a run down and overgrown property that was once for sale, now ours... it's time to get to work. This land is sort of a "blank canvas" with so much potential for my son and I. with the thick bedding cover and an abundance of water sources already present, the sky is the limit once we add food and give the wildlife the security they need... It is now time to turn this 300 acres into a land manager's and die hard hunter's dream!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E7 "Tree Management"
programme.desc: When people think of creating food sources on their property for deer and other wildlife, the first thing that comes to mind are food plots. While these can produce a high volume of palatable forage, another great option is to plant trees. A variety of soft and hard mass orchards, if cared for properly, can provide another great source of nutrition year round, taking the quality of deer on your property to the next level!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E8 "Plantation Story"
programme.desc: Every year we try to incorporate new projects to drastically change the quality of habitat we have on the farm for our wildlife. A couple of years ago that project was to create a small hunting plot in the middle of a heavily wooded area in one of our prime hunting locations. This project has turned into what we now call “The Plantation Plot”. As a deer manager creating habitat for the wildlife is one of the most rewarding things you can do. In previous episodes, we went over things like what to do prior to planting, annual vs perennial plots, and even breaking down brand new property. But in this episode we will come full circle, and apply all of those concepts, to create a successful food plot from scratch.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E9 "Frost Seeding"
programme.desc: Frost Seeding. It's a practice commonly overlooked, but when done correctly can produce major results at a time when wildlife need it the most! And with very little equipment required, this method of establishing food plots is perfect for just about anyone!

programme.title: On The Water S17: E5 "Brown Sharks From the Beach"
programme.desc: On The Water teams up with shark scientist Dr. Jeff Kneebone to tag brown sharks from shore.

programme.title: On The Water S17: E6 "Autumn Rainbows on the Deerfield"
programme.desc: Chris Megan heads west to the Deerfield River for a fall fly fishing trip with guide Chris Jackson.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E5 "Ladies, Ladies, Ladies"
programme.desc: Who says fishing is for the boys? This group of ladies is going out with Two Conchs for a few days and showing everyone that fishing isn't just for the men.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 26
programme.desc: Six remain in contention in the Sunshine State of Florida for a chance to win over $600,000. The recent WPT trend of young guns dominating the final table has not changed as four of the six finalists are twenty-seven years young or younger. These modern pros feel confident to play any hand with anyone making this a super aggressive final table. Amanda Leatherman anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten commentate from the booth at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 27
programme.desc: The two roommates, Kevin Eyster and Zo Karim, have survived to our final hour of coverage at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino along with persistent amateur, Ben Tarzia. Zo has risen from measly short stack to worthy contender, though he hasn’t been able to displace his buddy from the chip-lead as of yet. Amanda Leatherman anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring us the thrilling conclusion to the Seminole Hard Rock Poker Showdown.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 28
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher as the top poker pros and a mix of businessmen put up a staggering $100,000 to play in the largest buy-in event on the World Poker Tour. This stop is extra special for the WPT as not all of our finalists will cash! In fact, only the top three will go home with anything making this the largest money bubble in WPT history. Kimberly Lansing hosts the extraordinary event while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the super high roller action at Bellagio.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 29
programme.desc: The remarkable WPT Super High Roller rages on with only one knock out so far that being returning Super High roller finalist, Andrew Robl. The five that remain from the starting twenty-one are all in contention to win the over 1 million dollar first place prize but no one will be ready to settle down just yet with only the top three taking home prize money tonight. Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the intense action while Kimberly Lansing anchors the esteemed event.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 30
programme.desc: Two pros and two amateurs remain in the ridiculously high stakes $100,000 buy in action at Bellagio. The starting short stack, Dan Perper, has managed to push through and become chip-leader to start our final hour of coverage, but he won’t be able to rest easy yet as the four that remain are still on the bubble. Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call all the high stakes action in the concluding episode of this extravagant event.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 31
programme.desc: Top poker pros and talented businessmen descend on Las Vegas armed with a twenty five thousand dollar buy-in and battle to win the final World Poker Tour title of the season. The Royal Flush Girls enjoy the Vegas sun as the players try to keep their cool. Kimberly Lansing helms the anchor while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the action from Bellagio.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 32
programme.desc: It’s high stakes poker action at its finest in Las Vegas. Coverage includes highlights from Tiger Woods’ charity poker tournament while 4 players battle for the final WPT title of the season. Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you the play by play and Kimberly Lansing anchors the action from Bellagio.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 33
programme.desc: Season 11 of the World Poker Tour ends with a bang with the WPT Player of the Year honors on the line plus the most prestigious title of the season. Top poker pros Jonathan Roy and Chino Rheem are looking to win their second WPT title while Erick Lindgren is going for number three. Kimberly Lansing anchors the festivities as Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the heart stopping play by play at Bellagio.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 12 Episode 1
programme.desc: Trinidad's own Ryan Goindoo leads the WPT Legends of Poker final table, but it's Phil Laak who highlights the six remaining players at the final table. More than $600,000 is on the line.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Josh Novey - Tickling Grizzlies
programme.desc: Iraq War veteran Josh Novey takes the stage with an easy-going presence and jokes about Waffle House, kindly threatening his audience, and tickling grizzly bears.

programme.title: Alex Velluto - Spurious
programme.desc: Like Rocky Balboa, Alex Velluto is the son of an Italian immigrant and brings the same intensity, will, and drive to the comedy stage. In 2016, Alex was voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly Magazine and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. Alex is a regular at Wiseguys Comedy Club where he has headlined and worked with some of the biggest names in comedy. He has also “gone the distance” in many competitions and festivals across the country. Alex was a finalist in the the Funniest Person in Utah competition, and The Salt Lake Comedy Festival stand up competition, has performed at the Idaho Laugh Festival, and Finger Lakes Comedy Festival. In addition to his stand-up comedy, Alex is a co-host of the "Happy Valley Podcast", and is renowned for referring to himself in the third person, and is an excellent writer of comedy bios about himself that everybody likes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Orlando Baxter - Glorified Baby Sitter
programme.desc: Orlando Baxter's fresh perspective and unique relatability makes this former high school teacher a fan favorite all over the world. In 2016, Orlando made his late night TV debut on the Conan show on TBS, and since then he's appeared on the television shows "Comedy Up Late" in Australia, B.E.T.'s "50 Central" and Laff Mobb's Laff Track on Tru TV.

programme.title: Robert Mac - Know More
programme.desc: Robert's award-winning comedy is smart, subtle, and silly. Not too smart and not too subtle, but occasionally a bit more silly than youíd expect. And always clean. Robert is a regular at some of the finest comedy clubs around the country. Winner of "Comedy Centralís Laugh Riots." Finalist at "Billy Crystalís Mr. Saturday Night Contest", "San Francisco International Comedy Competition", "Boston Comedy Festival", "Jerry Lewis MDA Telethon Talent Search."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Andy Hendrickson - Left Field
programme.desc: Andy Hendrickson has multiple TV appearances including: The Late Show with David Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, Gotham Comedy Live, NBC/Seeso’s The Guest List and more. Internationally, Andy has performed at clubs and festivals throughout the world, including Canada, England, Holland, and Ireland. He also performed for our troops on Outback’s Feeding Freedom Tour that provided entertainment for the troops on military bases across Afghanistan.

programme.title: Leland Klassen - More True
programme.desc: Raised on a farm in the heart of Canada, Leland quickly learned that shoveling manure and weeding potatoes, although lucrative, wasnít his passion in life. So with absolutely no clear direction or vision for his future, he did what everyone does when they find themselves in that position - he went to University. He wisely chose his classes based on whichever cute girl happened to catch his attention and after several short years of last minute cramming and late assignments, Leland graduated from the University of Saskatchewan with a degree in Anthropology. As you might have guessed, Lelandís university education opened many doors for him in the years to come, but for some reason he was dissatisfied working for a courier as a night shift stock boy. By this time married and with his first child soon on the way, the most responsible and obvious choice was, of course, to pursue a career in the entertainment industry. Starting off at amateur nights and seedy bars Leland decided right from the beginning that he would remain clean despite what everyone else was doing and as a result over the last 16 years Leland has become recognized as Canadaís premier clean comedian. With his unique intelligence and wit, Leland has carved out quite a niche for himself in the world of entertainment. Using his farm boy charm and handsome (although somewhat inbred) Mennonite good looks, Lelandís clever observations and rich life experiences are brought to life in a one-of-a-kind show. LELANDíS CREDITS: Halifax Comedy Fest 2014, Just for Laughs in Montreal, 1999, 2001, 2004 and 2014, Host of Popcorn TV, Featured on Thou Shalt Laugh 5, Host of Comedy Tournament, Co-Host GMA Canada 2009, 2012 and 2013, Promise Keepers Canada, Episode of the US syndicated comedy series ìBananasî, Two of his own television seriesí on the West Coast, as well as Appeared on numerous other programs across the United States and Canada, such as Comedy Network, CBC Television, YTV, Star TV, Global and Discovery Kids.

programme.title: Joe Devito - First Of All
programme.desc: Joe DeVito's dead-on timing and unexpected twists make him a favorite at comedy clubs across the USA. His TV appearances include The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central, Comics Unleashed, and AXStv’s Gotham Comedy Live. He’s also a regular on TV news panels, finding the funny in pop culture and current events. Joe’s albums First Date with Joe DeVito and Three’s Comedy are in regular rotation on SiriusXM radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Johnny Beehner - The Flamingo Special
programme.desc: Johnny Beehner puts on a funny show. He's got everything you want from a comic: He's silly, he’s likeable, and he's fun. With a background in improvisational theater including training at Chicago’s prestigious Second City, as well as the Upright Citizens Brigade in Los Angeles, Johnny brings a unique style to the stage. Beehner made his network television debut in January of 2015 as one of the last comedians to appear on the Late Show with David Letterman. He has made numerous appearances on FOX "Laughs" television show, and regularly appears on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Show. His comedy can be heard regularly on XM/ Sirius Satellite radio. Other notable and accomplishments of Johnny's include winning First place in Comcast's 2014 season of "Trial By Laughter," placing third in the 2014 “Laughing Skull Comedy Festival” of Atlanta, and making it to the finals in the 2012 “Great American Comedy Festival”. He was named one of Ricky Gervais' Top 5 picks in the "Just Sayin” stand up contest. Johnny was recently named one of 2015's Top10, "Hot Comics to Watch" by his wife. She says that he would have a shot at the #1 spot if he would “work just a little bit harder”. He's a married man, a new dad, and his current life goal is to win just one argument with his beautiful wife.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this classic western, Clint Eastwood – aka “Blondie” – saves Eli Wallach from the hangman’s noose three separate times by shooting and severing the rope that he hangs from. We recreate each scene and test the reality of these shots with the weapons that were used.

Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.
